author: Special Correspondent
text: The Avraam Ami Trust celebrated the 146{+t}{+h}birth anniversary of L.K. Thulasiram, a freedom fighter, on Thursday at the Sourashtra Boys HSS. The speakers hailed his yeomen service. A century ago, he was instrumental in feeding poor students through noon-meal programme. Delhi Sourashtra Sangh secretary Kishore, former Assistant Commissioner Commercial Tax K.R. Gopal and Avraam Ami Trust president K. Devaraj spoke.
title: Freedom fighter remembered
